docs.snippet: Long after the end of his NHL career, Steve Payne is living an empty-nest life with his wife and three dogs in western Wisconsin....

docs.snippet: A New York City Council member is set to introduce a bill that that would ban smokeless tobacco from public arenas in the five boroughs....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York City Council member is set to introduce a bill that that would ban smokeless tobacco from public arenas in the five boroughs.
docs.abstract: New York City Council member Corey Johnson is set to introduce bill that would ban smokeless tobacco from public sports arenas in New York City, including Yankee Stadium and Citi Field; bill is similar to ones passed by other major cities and has support of New York Mets and Yankees.

headline.main: Citi Field and Yankee Stadium Could Become Off Limits to Smokeless Tobacco
headline.print_headline: Smokeless Tobacco May Be Banned at Citi Field and Yankee Stadium

docs.snippet: Riley, who coached at Army from 1950 to 1986, transformed his team of bickering amateurs into Olympic champions at the Squaw Valley Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Riley, who coached at Army from 1950 to 1986, transformed his team of bickering amateurs into Olympic champions at the Squaw Valley Games.
docs.abstract: Jack Riley, West Point hockey coach who led team of amateurs to gold in 1960 Winter Olympics, dies at age 95.

headline.main: Jack Riley, U.S. Coach of 1960 Gold Medal Hockey Team, Dies at 95
headline.print_headline: Jack Riley, Who Led U.S. to Hockey Gold, Dies at 95

docs.snippet: They both visualized Adam Vinatieri growing up, these even-keeled kickers who are hoping to emulate "Mr. Clutch" in Super Bowl 50....

headline.main: Both Kickers Hoping Super Bowl 50 Comes Down to Them
headline.print_headline: Both Kickers Hoping Super Bowl 50 Comes Down to Them

docs.snippet: In a city already split over gentrification, housing prices and the technology industry’s influence on local government, even the nation’s biggest party has become a battleground....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a city already split over gentrification, housing prices and the technology industry’s influence on local government, even the nation’s biggest party has become a battleground.
docs.abstract: Long-simmering tensions in San Francisco stemming from issues like gentrification, income inequality and outsize influence of technology industry in municipal matters have come to surface due to Super Bowl; cost of hosting Super Bowl is now clearly larger than expected, due mostly to security concerns.

headline.main: Super Bowl 50 Further Divides San Francisco
headline.print_headline: Super Bowl Is Further Dividing San Francisco

docs.snippet: As global health chiefs try to bring a Zika virus epidemic under control, aspiring Olympic athletes are weighing their lust for gold against health fears surrounding the mosquito-borne virus in Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: As global health chiefs try to bring a Zika virus epidemic under control, aspiring Olympic athletes are weighing their lust for gold against health fears surrounding the mosquito-borne virus in Brazil.

headline.main: Athletes Weigh Gold Lust Against Zika Health Fears
headline.print_headline: Athletes Weigh Gold Lust Against Zika Health Fears
